Major_Arcs.title: The Mystery and Demise of Ghost Town
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the enigmatic Ghost Town, explores its perceived historical authenticity and the emotional attachment characters have to it, and culminates in its abrupt destruction due to modern development.

sub_scenes.title: Initial Encounters in Ghost Town
sub_scenes.description: The narrative begins by immersing the reader in Ghost Town, showcasing its bustling saloon and the reactions of characters to its seemingly anachronistic existence.

narrative_arcs.title: Woman's Internal Thoughts on Time Discrepancy

sub_scenes.title: Ghost Town's Past and Present Revealed
sub_scenes.description: The narrative shifts to reveal Nan's personal history with Ghost Town and introduces the modern reality that threatens its existence, contrasting memory with impending change.

narrative_arcs.title: Clarification of Ghost Town's Current State
Reaction to Airport Plan - Initial Shock and Disbelief

sub_scenes.title: Demolition and Romantic Conflict
sub_scenes.description: As Ghost Town faces demolition, personal and romantic conflicts emerge, set against the backdrop of the town's destruction and the characters' differing perspectives on dreams and reality.

narrative_arcs.title: Cal's Perspective on Dreams and Ghost Town

Major_Arcs.title: Business, Family, and Romantic Tensions Amidst Crisis
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts from Ghost Town's destruction to focus on business logistics, family dynamics, and romantic tensions, all intensified by an impending blizzard and the threat to their livelihood.

sub_scenes.description: The scene transitions to business discussions intertwined with familial conflict, highlighting Nan's frustration with her father's dismissiveness and controlling nature.

sub_scenes.title: Reassurance and Resolve
sub_scenes.description: Nan seeks solace and advice, receiving reassurance about love and relationships from her mother and the maid, which leads to her internal resolve to seek clarity with Cal.

narrative_arcs.title: Confirmation of Cal's Affection and Effort

sub_scenes.title: Confession, Departure, and Longing
sub_scenes.description: Nan confronts Cal with her feelings, but their intimate moment is interrupted by duty and separation, leading to Nan's emotional turmoil during his absence.

narrative_arcs.title: Expression of Deep Feelings and Cryptic Response

Confession of Pursuit and Revealed Motivation

sub_scenes.title: Blizzard and Hay Lift
sub_scenes.description: A severe blizzard hits, escalating the crisis and threatening livestock. Amid personal conversations, the community faces the harsh weather, leading to a hopeful intervention with 'Operation Hay Lift'.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Confession about Changed Behavior
